duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for managing the month-end/year-end close process and overseeing the preparation of all monthly reporting and analysis.
Provide support to the team to ensure timely completion of the close process and collaborate with other departments to implement necessary changes for internal controls.
Review and prepare reconciliations over GL accounts for external audit purposes.
Manage 2-3 direct reports by providing technical support and coaching, and review and approve Journal Entries prepared by the Senior & Staff Accountants.
Establish productive relationships within the Accounting team and other departments, and possess strong interpersonal skills and positive disposition.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field (Master's preferred)
